entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 70 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
